    • Uses of Component in components

      Subclasses of Component in components 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Damagable
      This class should be used for objects which can be damaged
      class  Effect
      Super class for effects.
      class  NetComponent
      This component is for gameobjects which should be sent to server clients.
      class  Player
      Component for a player
      class  Renderer
      Component for rendering basic textures and animations
      class  Spawn
      This class represents a players spawn inside the world
      There may be only one of these for each player
